method: In a large pot, bring the filtered water to a boil.
Add the transparent broth cubes and stir until dissolved.
Chop the clear celery and crystal carrot into small pieces.
Add the clear celery, crystal carrot, and translucent thyme to the pot.
Strain the soup to remove any solids.
Serve the crystal clear soup in transparent bowls and garnish with a sprig of translucent thyme.
